import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./notes.css"; const GateNotes = () => { const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(""); const notesData = [ { subject: "Mathematics", link: "/notes/mathematics.pdf" }, { subject: "Data Structures", link: "/notes/data-structures.pdf" }, { subject: "Algorithms", link: "/notes/algorithms.pdf" }, { subject: "Operating Systems", link: "/notes/operating-systems.pdf" }, { subject: "Computer Networks", link: "/notes/computer-networks.pdf" }, ]; const filteredNotes = notesData.filter((note) => note.subject.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ); return ( <>
